00029 #include "my_app.h"
00030 
00031 // Create a new application object: this macro will allow wxWindows to create
00032 // the application object during program execution (it's better than using a
00033 // static object for many reasons) and also declares the accessor function
00034 // wxGetApp() which will return the reference of the right type (i.e. MyApp and
00035 // not wxApp)
00036 IMPLEMENT_APP(MyApp)
00037 
00038 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(MyApp, wxApp)
00039     EVT_TASKBAR_RIGHT_UP(MyApp::OnTaskRightDown)
00040     EVT_TASKBAR_LEFT_UP(MyApp::OnTaskLeftDown)
00041     EVT_MENU(xFarDic_QApp,  MyApp::OnQuit)    
00042     EVT_MENU(xFarDic_Paste,  MyApp::OnPaste)    
00043     EVT_MENU(xFarDic_About,  MyApp::OnAbout)    
00044     EVT_MENU(xFarDic_Settings,  MyApp::OnSettings)    
00045     EVT_MENU(xFarDic_Setfont,  MyApp::OnSetFont)    
00046 END_EVENT_TABLE()
00047 
00049 bool MyApp::OnInit()
00050 {
00051     // Disabling wxLog
00052     wxLogNull logNo;
00053 
00054     wxString xapp = wxString::Format(_T("xFarDic"), wxGetUserId().c_str());
00055     m_checker = new wxSingleInstanceChecker(xapp);
00056     if (m_checker->IsAnotherRunning())
00057     {
00058         wxString msg;
00059         msg.Printf( _("Another program instance is already running, aborting."));
00060         wxMessageBox(msg, _T("xFarDic"), wxOK | wxICON_EXCLAMATION, 0);
00061         return FALSE;
00062     }
00063 
00064     wxImage::AddHandler(new wxPNGHandler);
00065 
00066     wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00067 
00068     // note that it makes no sense to translate these strings, they are
00069     // shown before we set the locale anyhow
00070         const wxString langNames[] =
00071         {
00072             _T("Farsi"),
00073             _T("English (U.S.)"),
00074             _T("System default"),
00075             //_T("Azeri")
00076         };
00077 
00078      static const wxLanguage langIds[] =
00079     {
00080         wxLANGUAGE_FARSI,
00081         wxLANGUAGE_ENGLISH,
00082         wxLANGUAGE_DEFAULT,
00083         //wxLANGUAGE_AZERI_LATIN
00084     };
00085 
00086     // the arrays should be in sync
00087     wxCOMPILE_TIME_ASSERT( WXSIZEOF(langNames) == WXSIZEOF(langIds),
00088                                LangArraysMismatch );
00089 
00090     pConfig->SetPath(_T("/Options"));
00091     m_locale.Init(langIds[pConfig->Read(_T("GUI-Lang"), 2)]);  
00092     
00093     //    m_locale.Init(langIds[1]);
00094 
00095     // Initialize the catalogs we'll be using
00096     m_locale.AddCatalogLookupPathPrefix(_T("/usr/share/locale/"));
00097     m_locale.AddCatalogLookupPathPrefix(_T("/usr/local/share/locale/"));
00098     m_locale.AddCatalog(_T("xfardic"));
00099 
00100     // this catalog is installed in standard location on Linux systems and
00101     // shows that you may make use of the standard message catalogs as well
00102     //
00103     // if it's not installed on your system, it is just silently ignored
00104      wxLogNull noLog;
00105      m_locale.AddCatalog(_T("fileutils"));
00106 
00107     //DEBUGGING
00108     //fprintf(stderr, "Going to starting Frame\n");     
00109 
00110     // create the main application window
00111     frame = new xFarDicApp(_T("xFarDic ")XVERSION, wxPoint(150, 150), wxSize(520, 300), m_locale,
00112                            wxMINIMIZE_BOX | wxSYSTEM_MENU | wxCLOSE_BOX | wxCAPTION );
00113 
00114     //DEBUGGING
00115     //fprintf(stderr, "Frame Started\n");       
00116                            
00117     // uncomment this to force writing back of the defaults for all values
00118     // if they're not present in the config - this can give the user an idea
00119     // of all possible settings for this program
00120     // pConfig->SetRecordDefaults();
00121 
00122     // restore frame position
00123     int x = pConfig->Read(_T("x"), 0l);
00124     int y = pConfig->Read(_T("y"), 0l);
00125     int saved = pConfig->Read(_T("Save-Cache"), 1);    
00126 
00127     if(x == 0 && y ==0){
00128         frame->Centre();
00129     }
00130 
00131     // and show it (the frames, unlike simple controls, are not shown when
00132     // created initially)
00133 
00134     // translate first cached word
00135     if(saved != 0){
00136        wxString str;
00137        long dummy;
00138        pConfig->SetPath(_T("/Cache"));
00139        bool bCont = pConfig->GetFirstEntry(str, dummy);
00140        if(bCont){
00141           frame->translate();
00142         }
00143     } 
00144       
00145     frame->Show(TRUE);
00146     
00147     // success: wxApp::OnRun() will be called which will enter the main message
00148     // loop and the application will run. If we returned FALSE here, the
00149     // application would exit immediately.
00150     //fprintf(stderr, "Finished OnInit()\n");
00151     return TRUE;
00152 }
00153 
00155 void MyApp::OnTaskRightDown(wxTaskBarIconEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00156 {               
00157       frame->PopMenu(); 
00158      //DEBUGGING
00159      //fprintf(stderr, "task right click\n");
00160 }
00161 
00163 void MyApp::OnTaskLeftDown(wxTaskBarIconEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00164 {
00165 
00166      if (frame->IsIconized()){                                                                                                               
00167                 if(frame->hide){
00168                         frame->Show(TRUE);  
00169                 }else{
00170                         frame->Raise();
00171                         frame->SetFocus();                                                                                    
00172                 }
00173          } else{
00174                       if(frame->hide){                                                                                                               
00175                         frame->Show(FALSE);                                                                                       
00176                       }         
00177         }                                    
00178     //DEBUGGING
00179     //fprintf(stderr, "task left click\n");
00180 }
00181 
00182 void MyApp::OnSetFont(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00183 {
00184     frame->Show(TRUE);
00185     frame->Raise();
00186     frame->SetFocus();
00187     frame->ShowSetFont();
00188 }
00189 
00190 void MyApp::OnSettings(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00191 {
00192     frame->Show(TRUE);
00193     frame->Raise();
00194     frame->SetFocus();
00195     frame->ShowSettings();
00196 }
00197 
00198 void MyApp::OnAbout(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00199 {
00200     frame->Show(TRUE);          
00201     frame->Raise();
00202     frame->SetFocus();
00203     frame->ShowAbout();
00204 }
00205 
00206 void MyApp::OnPaste(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00207 {
00208   
00209     frame->Show(TRUE);
00210     frame->Raise();
00211     frame->SetFocus();
00212     frame->DoPaste();
00213 }
00214 
00215 void MyApp::OnQuit(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00216 {              
00217         frame->Destroy();  
00218        //DEBUGGING
00219        //fprintf(stderr, "Quit\n");
00220 }
00221 
00222 MyApp::~MyApp()
00223 {
00224         // Delete execution Lock file
00225         delete m_checker;
00226 }
